data.name: Country_Demonym_England
data.comment: [MultiValue] Demonym for country, eg "... has been captured {}.", "... has been captured by the {}."

data.name: Country_Demonym_USA
data.comment: [MultiValue] Demonym for country, eg "... has been captured {}.", "... has been captured by the {}."

data.name: Country_Demonym_France
data.comment: [MultiValue] Demonym for country, eg "... has been captured {}.", "... has been captured by the {}."

data.name: Country_Demonym_Germany
data.comment: [MultiValue] Demonym for country, eg "... has been captured {}.", "... has been captured by the {}."

data.name: Country_Demonym_Italy
data.comment: [MultiValue] Demonym for country, eg "... has been captured {}.", "... has been captured by the {}."

data.name: Country_Demonym_Japan
data.comment: [MultiValue] Demonym for country, eg "... has been captured {}.", "... has been captured by the {}."

data.name: Country_Demonym_Commonwealth
data.comment: [MultiValue] Demonym for country, eg "... has been captured {}.", "... has been captured by the {}."

data.name: Country_Demonym_Russia
data.comment: [MultiValue] Demonym for country, eg "... has been captured {}.", "... has been captured by the {}."

data.name: Error_AnErrorOccuredParsing
data.comment: {0} = Xml filename, Error message when parsing an xml file fails, "An error occured parsing captures.xml"

data.name: Event_Misc_InChokePoint
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, Appended to facility name, "British Production Facility 5 {} has been ..."

data.name: Event_Desc_FacilityRecaptured
data.comment: {0} = Facility name (optional "in ChokePoint"), {1} = Country Demonym, {2} = Player name (optional " (squad)"), "Peer-Achel [in Peer] has been recaptured British by xiper[ (16id)]"

data.name: Event_Desc_FacilityCaptured
data.comment: {0} = Facility name (optional "in ChokePoint"), {1} = Country Demonym, {2} = Player name (optional " (squad)"), "Peer-Achel [in Peer] has been captured German by xiper[ (16id)]"

data.name: Event_Desc_SpawnableRecaptured
data.value: The {0} spawnable in {1} has been recaptured {2} by {3}.
data.comment: {0} = Enemy ChokePoint, {1} = Friendly ChokePoint, {2} = Country Demonym, {3} = Player name (optional " (squad)"), "The Achel spawnable in Peer has been recaptured British by xiper[ (16id)]."

data.name: Event_Desc_SpawnableCaptured
data.value: The {0} spawnable in {1} has been captured {2} by {3}.
data.comment: {0} = Enemy ChokePoint, {1} = Friendly ChokePoint, {2} = Country Demonym, {3} = Player name (optional " (squad)"), "The Achel spawnable in Peer has been captured German by xiper[ (16id)]."

data.name: Event_Desc_ChokePointCapturedAfter
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, {1} = Country name, {2} = Time taken, "Peer has been captured by England after 1h22m!"

data.name: Event_Desc_ChokePointCaptured
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, {1} = Country name, "Peer has been captured by England!"

data.name: Event_Desc_ChokePointUnderAttack
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, {1} = Enemy side, "Peer is under attack by Axis forces!"

data.name: Event_Desc_ChokePointUnderAttackAgain
data.value: {0} is under attack again by {1} forces.
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, {1} = Enemy side, "Peer is under attack again by Axis forces!"

data.name: Event_Desc_ChokePointRegainedAfter
data.value: {0} has been regained by {1} forces after {2}.
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, {1} = Side name, {2} = Time taken, "Liege has been regained by Allied forces after 32 mins."

data.name: Event_Desc_ChokePointRegained
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, {1} = Side name, "Liege has been regained by Allied forces."

data.name: Event_Desc_ChokePointControlRegained
data.comment: {0} = Side name, {1} = ChokePoint name, "Allied forces have regained control Liege."

data.name: Event_Desc_ChokePointControlGained
data.comment: {0} = Side name, {1} = ChokePoint name, "Axis forces have gained control Liege."

data.name: Event_Desc_AOPlaced
data.value: The {0} {1} have ordered an attack on {2}.
data.comment: {0} = Enemy side, {1} = Brigade name, {2} = ChokePoint name, "The Allied 52 Squadron (Bomber Brigade) have ordered an attack on Liege."

data.name: Event_Desc_AOPlacedDeployed
data.value: The {0} {1} deployed in {2} have ordered an attack on {3}.
data.comment: {0} = Enemy side, {1} = Brigade name, {2} = Enemy ChokePoint, {3} = Friendly ChokePoint name, "The Allied 52 Squadron (Bomber Brigade) deployed in Brussels have ordered an attack on Liege."

data.name: Event_Desc_AORecalled
data.value: The {0} attack on {1} has been recalled.
data.comment: {0} = Enemy side, {1} = ChokePoint name, "The Axis attack on Liege has been recalled."

data.name: Enum_Side_Allied
data.comment: [MultiValue] Allied side name, eg "... has been regained by {} forces", "The {} 52 Squadron have ordered an attack..."

data.name: Enum_Side_Axis
data.comment: [MultiValue] Axis side name, eg "... has been regained by {} forces", "The {} 52 Squadron have ordered an attack..."

data.name: Event_Desc_FirebaseBlownOffensive
data.value: The {0} has been blown, the {1:v2} now have an offensive FB to {2}.
data.comment: {0} = Firebase name, {1} = Country Demonym, {2} = ChokePoint name, "The Peer-Achel FB has been blown, the Germans now have an offensive FB to Peer."

data.name: Event_Desc_FirebaseBlownDefensive
data.value: The {0} has been blown, the {1:v2} now have a defensive FB to {2}.
data.comment: {0} = Firebase name, {1} = Country Demonym, {2} = ChokePoint name, "The Peer-Achel FB has been blown, the Germans now have a defensive FB to Peer."

data.name: Event_Desc_FirebaseBlownBrigadeNonspawnable
data.value: The {0} has been blown, the {1:v2} now have a (non-spawnable) brigade FB to {2}.
data.comment: {0} = Firebase name, {1} = Country Demonym, {2} = ChokePoint name, "The Peer-Achel FB has been blown, the Germans now have a (non-spawnable) brigade FB to Peer."

data.name: Event_Desc_FirebaseBlownBrigade
data.value: The {0} has been blown, the {1:v2} now have a brigade FB to {2}.
data.comment: {0} = Firebase name, {1} = Country Demonym, {2} = ChokePoint name, "The Peer-Achel FB has been blown, the Germans now have a brigade FB to Peer."

data.name: Event_Title_NewBrigadeFirebase
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, "New brigade fb to Peer"

data.name: Event_Desc_NewBrigadeFirebase
data.value: {0} has a new brigade FB from {1} to {2}.
data.comment: {0} = Country name, {1} = From ChokePoint name, {2} = To ChokePoint name, "England has a new brigade FB from Peer to Achel."

data.name: Event_Misc_DivisionHQ
data.comment: Appended to HCUnit title if it's a division, "70 Bomber Wing {} has been ..."

data.name: Event_Desc_HCUnitMoved
data.value: {0} has been redeployed from {1} to {2} by {3}.
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit title, {1} = Old ChokePoint name, {2} = New ChokePoint name, {3} = Player name, "70 Bomber Wing [Division HQ] has been redeployed from Seclin to S-Hertogenbosch by xiper."

data.name: Event_Desc_HCUnitDeployed
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit title, {1} = ChokePoint name, "70 Bomber Wing has been deployed at Seclin."

data.name: Event_Title_HCUnitRetreat
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit title, "70 Bomber Wing has retreated"

data.name: Event_Desc_HCUnitRetreat
data.value: {0} has retreated from {1} to {2} after being overrun.
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit title, {1} = Old ChokePoint name, {2} = New ChokePoint name, "70 Bomber Wing [Division HQ] has retreated from Seclin to S-Hertogenbosch after being overrun."

data.name: Event_Desc_HCUnitRouted
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit title, {1} = ChokePoint name, "70 Bomber Wing has been routed from Seclin!"

data.name: Event_Desc_FactoryDamaged
data.value: {0} at {1} has received {2}% damage, currently at {3}% health.
data.comment: {0} = Factory name, {1} = Factory ChokePoint, {2} = Damage, {3} = Health, "British Production Facility 4 at Ashford has received 10% damage, currently at 90% health."

data.name: Event_Desc_FactoryHealthy
data.comment: {0} = Factory name, {1} = Factory ChokePoint, "British Production Facility 4 at Ashford has reached 100% health."

data.name: Event_Desc_FactoryDestroyed
data.comment: {0} = Factory name, {1} = Factory ChokePoint, "British Production Facility 4 at Ashford has been destroyed."

data.name: Event_Desc_FactoryRDPStart
data.value: {0} at {1} has resumed production following repairs.
data.comment: {0} = Factory name, {1} = Factory ChokePoint, "British Production Facility 4 at Ashford has resumed production following repairs."

data.name: Event_Desc_FactoryRDPStopCaptured
data.value: {0} at {1} has halted production due to being captured.
data.comment: {0} = Factory name, {1} = Factory ChokePoint, "British Production Facility 4 at Ashford has halted production due to being captured."

data.name: Event_Desc_FactoryRDPStopDamaged
data.value: {0} at {1} has halted production due to excessive damage.
data.comment: {0} = Factory name, {1} = Factory ChokePoint, "British Production Facility 4 at Ashford has halted production due to excessive damage."

data.name: Time_MinsAgo
data.comment: {0} = Minutes ago, "1h10m ago", "1 hour, 10 mins ago"

data.name: OrderOfBattle_DeployTooltip_DeployedMoved
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit level, {1} = ChokePoint name, {2} = Player name, {3} = Long minutes ago, "Division moved to Peer by xiper 1 hour, 10 mins ago"

data.name: OrderOfBattle_DeployTooltip_NotDeployed
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit level, "Brigade is not currently deployed"

data.name: OrderOfBattle_DeployTooltip_NotDeployedRouted
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit level, {1} = Long minutes ago, "Brigade routed 1 hour, 10 mins ago"

data.name: OrderOfBattle_DeployTooltip_NotDeployedRoutedFrom
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit level, {1} = ChokePoint name, {2} = Long minutes ago, "Brigade routed from Peer 1 hour, 10 mins ago"

data.name: OrderOfBattle_RedeployTooltip_DeployedCanMove
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit level, "Brigade is available to be moved"

data.name: OrderOfBattle_RedeployTooltip_DeployedCanMoveIn
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit level, {1} = Long minutes, "Brigade can be moved in 1 hour, 10 mins"

data.name: OrderOfBattle_RedeployTooltip_UndeployedCanDeploy
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit level, "Brigade is available to be deployed"

data.name: OrderOfBattle_RedeployTooltip_UndeployedCanDeployIn
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit level, {1} = Long minutes, "Brigade can be deployed in 1 hour, 10 mins"

data.name: Error_CheckNetworkSettings
data.value: Do you want to check your network settings and retry?
data.comment: Error message when network operation fails, OK/Cancel buttons

data.name: Error_TryAgain
data.comment: {0} = "Battleground Europe Game Monitor", Message box after checking network settings, before reinitialising.

data.name: GameStatus_UpdateAvailable
data.comment: Tooltip for BEGM version after update check

data.name: GameStatus_NoUpdateAvailable
data.comment: Tooltip for BEGM version after update check

data.name: Error_EventLoopBusy
data.value: Currently checking for new events in the background, please try again in a second.
data.comment: Error message when trying to force check but currently busy polling.

data.name: GameStatus_Reinitialising
data.comment: Message under gears animation when initialising again.

data.name: Error_Sleep
data.comment: Error message when going to sleep fails

data.name: Error_ClockSkew
data.comment: {0} = Skew in minutes, {1} = Local time, {2} = Remote time, Error message when user clock is out of sync

data.name: NetManager_PleaseEnterCredentials
data.value: Please enter your Proxy Server credentials

data.name: NetManager_ConnectTo
data.comment: {0} = Proxy name, Proxy credentials dialog title

data.name: NetManager_ConnectToProxy
data.comment: Proxy credentials dialog title (proxy name unknown)

data.name: Error_DownloadError
data.comment: {0} = Xml filename, Error message when a download fails, "An error occured downloading captures.xml"

data.name: Error_HeaderErrorLastMod
data.value: An error occurred getting the Last-Modified header
data.comment: Error message when download of lastmod header fails

data.name: Error_ParseDatetime
data.comment: {0} = Datetime string, Error message if server sends unknown date/time format

data.name: Error_HeaderError
data.value: An error occurred getting the headers for {0}
data.comment: {0} = Xml filename, Error when download of xml headers fails, "An error occured getting the headers for captures.xml"

data.name: Error_LoadNetworkSettings
data.value: An error occurred loading your network settings, they have been reset to defaults.
data.comment: Error message when loading invalid network settings from registry

data.name: Error_NetworkSettingsUntested
data.value: Your network settings haven't been tested. Would you like to test them now?
data.comment: Warning message when changing network settings without testing, Buttons Yes/No/Cancel

data.name: Error_ApplyNetworkSettings
data.value: An error occurred applying your network settings
data.comment: Error message when changing to invalid network settings

data.name: Error_InvalidPort
data.comment: Popup error when entering an invalid port number under network settings

data.name: Options_SleepMode
data.value:
When in sleep mode, Battleground Europe Game Monitor will "hibernate", using as little memory/cpu as possible and no network bandwidth.
Waking up again will require an approx {0}kb download of data to re-establish game state.
data.comment: {0} = kb required for startup (depends on whether also loading factory data), Text in Sleep Mode info box on startup tab

data.name: Error_SaveNetwork
data.comment: Error message when saving Network settings to registry fails

data.name: Error_SaveStartup
data.comment: Error message when saving Startup settings to registry fails

data.name: Error_SaveAlert
data.comment: Error message when saving Alert settings to registry fails

data.name: Error_SaveMisc
data.comment: Error message when saving Misc settings to registry fails

data.name: Error_SaveMap
data.comment: Error message when saving Map settings to registry fails

data.name: Error_WindowsVersion
data.value: Battleground Europe Game Monitor requires Windows 2000 or greater.
data.comment: Error message on startup if unsupported operating system

data.name: Error_AlreadyRunning
data.value: Battleground Europe Game Monitor is already running.
data.comment: Error message on startup if BEGM is already running

data.name: Error_NonDefaultDPI
data.value:
Battleground Europe Game Monitor doesn't currently support your screen DPI setting ({0} dpi).
Windows XP: Control Panel => Display => Settings => Advanced => General => 96 dpi.
data.comment: Error message on startup if user has non default dpi setting

data.name: Error_CrashLogfile
data.comment: {0} = Logfile path, Error message when BEGM crashes with a logfile

data.name: Error_CrashTitle
data.comment: {0} = BEGM version, Error message dialog title

data.name: Error_CrashNoLogfile
data.value:
Congratulations, you've made Battleground Europe Game Monitor crash! :)
Could you please press <Ctrl>+C to copy this information and paste it in an email to xiperware@gmail.com along with what you were doing at the time. This will help the developer to identify and fix the problem.
data.comment: Error message when BEGM crashes without logfile

data.name: Error_Wakeup
data.value: Failed to launch Battleground Europe Game Monitor
data.comment: Error message when waking up fails

data.name: CurrentAttacks_ShowAlerts
data.comment: Show alerts checkbox (in each cp section)

data.name: Time_ReceivedMinsAgo
data.comment: {0} = Long minutes, eg, Event tooltip "15 mins ago (received 25 mins ago)"

data.name: CurrentAttacks_Tooltip_NoEvents
data.value: {0} has an AO but no events in the past two hours
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, Tooltip when a section is disabled

data.name: FactoryStatus_Health
data.comment: {0} = Health percent, Health text in side summary

data.name: FactoryStatus_OutputPercent
data.comment: {0} = Percent production output today, {1} = Percent production output campaign, Side summary output percentages

data.name: FactoryStatus_RDPCycle
data.comment: {0} = Cycle number, {1} = Cycle progress percent, {2} = Short time until cycle complete, RDP info line at top of each country

data.name: FactoryStatus_RDPCycleNoEta
data.comment: {0} = Cycle number, {1} = Cycle progress percent, RDP info line at top of each country

data.name: FactoryStatus_Tooltip_EstimatedCompletion
data.comment: {0} = Date/time of cycle complete, Tooltip for FactoryStatus_RDPCycle eta section

data.name: FactoryStatus_Tooltip_RdpPoints
data.comment: {0} = Points completed, {1} = Total points in cycle, Tooltip for FactoryStatus_RDPCycle complete section

data.name: FactoryStatus_Tooltip_OutputDay
data.comment: {0} = Output percent, Tooltip for factory daily output percent and bar graph

data.name: FactoryStatus_Tooltip_OutputCampaign
data.comment: {0} = Output percent, Tooltip for factory campaign output percent and pie graph

data.name: FactoryStatus_Tooltip_CurrentHealth
data.comment: {0} = Factory health, Tooltip for factory health

data.name: Time_CapturedMinsAgo
data.comment: {0} = Long minutes, "Owner: England (captured 1 hour, 10 mins ago)"

data.name: Time_RegainedMinsAgo
data.comment: {0} = Long minutes, "Controlled by: Germany (regained 1 hour, 10 mins ago)"

data.name: Time_GainedMinsAgo
data.comment: {0} = Long minutes, "Controlled by: England (gained 1 hour, 10 mins ago)"

data.name: TownStatus_Tooltip_AOPlacedBy
data.comment: {0} = HCUnit title (optional Misc_AtChokePoint), "Placed by OIC of 1st Infantry Division [at Peer]"

data.name: Misc_AtChokePoint
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, Appended to hcunit name, Used by eg TownStatus_Tooltip_AOPlacedBy

data.name: Time_RemovedMinsAgo
data.comment: {0} = Long minutes, "No Attack Objective (removed 1 hour, 10 mins ago)"

data.name: TownStatus_NoAttackObjective
data.comment: If town doesn't have an AO

data.name: TownStatus_UnderAttackFrom
data.comment: Prefix for attacking town/town list, "{} Peer", "{} Peer (75%), Achel (25%)"

data.name: TownStatus_Tooltip_CapturedBy
data.comment: {0} = Player name, Tooltip for each facility name, "[1:55] Captured by xiper"

data.name: Common_DivisionHQ
data.comment: Name of a Division HQ in the various Deployed HC Units lists

data.name: Common_Tooltip_GoToMap
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, Tooltip for town flag link, "Go to Peer on map"

data.name: TownStatus_Tooltip_FirebaseNone
data.value: There are no firebases between {0} and {1}
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, {1} = ChokePoint name, Tooltip for no firebase, "There are no firebases between Peer and Achel"

data.name: TownStatus_Tooltip_FirebaseInactive
data.value: The firebases between {0} and {1} are not currently active
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, {1} = ChokePoint name, Tooltip for grey firebase, "The firebases between Peer and Achel are not currently active"

data.name: TownStatus_Tooltip_FirebaseUp
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, {1} = ChokePoint name, {2} = Firebase state, {3} = Side name, Tooltip for green firebase, "The Peer-Achel brigade firebase is up (Axis)"

data.name: TownStatus_Tooltip_FirebaseDown
data.comment: {0} = ChokePoint name, {1} = ChokePoint name, {2} = Firebase state, {3} = Side name, Tooltip for red firebase, "The Peer-Achel offensive firebase is down (Allied)"

data.comment: The brigade firebase name, "The Peer-Achel {} firebase is ..."

data.name: Enum_FirebaseState_Defensive
data.comment: The defensive firebase name, "The Peer-Achel {} firebase is ..."

data.name: Enum_FirebaseState_Offensive

data.name: Time_PlacedMinsAgo
